Original: 中國科技大學校內的咖啡廳，有各種好喝咖啡，也有好吃的簡餐，非常推薦炸雞排蓋飯。
EN: There are various delicious coffee and delicious meals in the cafe in the University of China University of Science and Technology. It is recommended that fried chicken steak rice is very recommended.

Original:
位在大學裏，所以有一般咖啡廳的風貌，也有所處地點的特色，例如：廳堂寬闊、歡迎包場；明亮潔淨、氣氛活潑；餐飲多元、價錢親民；擺放傳單、襄助活動；設置WIFI與插座、便於學生使用；不限時間、氣氛悠閒；一~五營業、六日休息。
廳址在中國科技大學崇德樓一樓，從捷運萬芳站步行過來，約10分鐘，進了校門，往前直走，2分鐘後，便清楚地看見它了一一戶外桌椅成排、室內彩光閃爍，這就是DREAM GO BAR啦！
戶外木製的方桌長椅，大約20席，散發出野餐趣味；室內潔淨的白色桌椅，大約60席，洋溢著明朗敞亮的氣息；長排觀景窗上，貼著聖誕公公圖像、放著茸茸熊家寶寶、立著活動海報；牆邊一隅，佈置成了聖誕景區；櫃檯上有菜單、獨家產品、聖誕裝飾，還有校內活動傳單，最新的一張是「愛的聖誕節 • 我的禮物我設計」。
餐飲種類頗多：早午餐、帕尼尼、泰式料理、抹醬吐司、義大利麵、燉飯、炸物、蛋糕、餅乾、咖啡、鮮奶、茶飲、果汁、可樂、醋飲……，價錢都不貴。
玫瑰拿鐵拉花漂亮、波士頓布丁派整體鬆軟、手作蔓越莓牛軋餅裏塞了洛神花、現炸芋泥地瓜球顆粒不少。
工作人員十分年輕，都親切有禮、活潑伶俐，本以為她們是學生，問後才知她們是學校委外廠商的員工，服務態度非常良好。
營業時間9：00~17 ：00、週六週日公休、低消一杯飲料、有WIFI、觀景單人座桌底有插座、採自助式、收現金 / Line Pay、不加服務費。
EN:
It is located in the university, so there is the style of the average cafes and the characteristics of the location, such as: the hall is wide, welcome to the court; bright and clean, lively atmosphere; diverse catering and price; placement of leaflets, assisting activities; setting wifi and setting WiFi and setting Sockets, convenient for students; unlimited time, leisurely atmosphere; one to five business, six days of rest.
The site is on the first floor of Chongde Building of the University of Science and Technology of China. Walking from the MRT Wanfang Station, about 10 minutes, enter the school gate, go straight, 2 minutes later, you can clearly see it one by one. The color of the indoor is flashing, this is Dream Go Bar!
Outdoor wooden cubic bench, about 20 seats, exuding picnic fun; indoor clean white tables and chairs, about 60 seats, filled with bright and bright atmosphere; Boarded Bear Family, standing on the poster of the event; a hillside on the wall, it is arranged as a Christmas scenic spot; there are menus, exclusive products, Christmas decorations on the counter, and on -school activity leaflets. I design a gift. "
There are many types of catering: breakfast, Panini, Thai cuisine, sauce toast, pasta, stewed rice, fried, cakes, coffee, coffee, fresh milk, tea, juice, cola, vinegar drink ... …, The price is not expensive.
The rose latte lattone is beautiful, the Boston pudding school is soft as a whole, and the hand -made cranberry beef rolling cake is stuffed with Luo Shenhua, and there are many granules of the current fried taro puree.
The staff are very young, all kind, polite, lively and smart. They thought they were students. After asking, they knew that they were employees of outsourced manufacturers of schools. The service attitude was very good.
Business hours from 9: 00 ~ 17:00, Saturdays and Sundays, low -eliminate a cup of beverages, WiFi, the bottom of the viewing single -seater table with sockets, self -help type, cash collection / line pay, no service fee.
